TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Donkuan, title = Donkuan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donkuan} }

S.FORM: = Donkuan = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Wanjungsyang ka alang Donkuan. 151 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 553 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 98% niqan 541 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 2% niqan 12 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Bunun 83%, Amis 3%, Tayal 1%, Truku 1%, ni rahuq na o 10%. Pusu nniqan alang Nniqan alang Nyusan Skanki nsgan Maribasi alang Ma-yuan. Klgan seejiq nealang Bunun. Djiyun kari Bunun.

= Donkoan = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Wanjongsyang ka alang Donkoan. 151 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 553 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 98% niqan 541 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 2% niqan 12 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Bonon 83%, Amis 3%, Tayal 1%, Troko 1%, ni rahoq na o 10%. Poso nniqan alang Nniqan alang Nyosan Skanki nsgan Maribasi alang Ma-yoan. Klgan seejiq nealang Bonon. Djiyon kari Bonon.
